title: Best application for "offline" fonts browsing/cataloguing...
content:
Hello everydoby,

i’m searching for a decent application that can  
build a database with previews of fonts located  
on cd’s/dvd’s. What do you recommend?

Thanks.

 [‹ character frequencies?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080228042946/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42123 "Go to previous forum topic") [Ambigram commission ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080228042946/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42148 "Go to next forum topic")
author: gerasidi
